metadata.title: SlashNext Security Events for Microsoft Sentinel - Get customer incidents and log
metadata.description: The playbook will run after every 3 mintues to get list of events occured to a customer in that time and log them in Log Analytic Workspace.
prerequisites: 1.**SlashNext Logic Apps Connector** supports **Basic** authentication, while creating connection you will be asked to provide API key.
To acquire SlashNext API key, please contact us at [support@slashnext.com](mailto:support@slashnext.com) or visit [SlashNext.com](www.slashnext.com)
2. Prior to the deployment of this playbook, Azure log analytic workspace needs to be deployed under the same subscription.
3. Prior to the deployment of this playbook, Azure storage account needs to be deployed under the same subscription.
4. Prior to the deployment of this playbook, Inside storage account create a container named as offset.
postDeployment: 2. Authorize SlashNext custom connector using SlashNext customer key.

releaseNotes.title: SlashNext Security Events for Microsoft Sentinel

properties.descriptionHtml:
Note: Please refer to the following before installing the solution:

• Review the solution Release Notes

• There may be known issues pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing.

The Slashnext SIEM logic app retrieves incidents associated with a customer from various sources such as SMS, mobile devices, web extensions, and emails. These incidents are then presented and recorded within the Log Analytic Workspace.

Custom Azure Logic Apps Connectors: 1, Playbooks: 1

Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel | Learn more about Solutions
